entry.title: Channel Insights Sharing Setting, Product Tags, 10-Year Channel Memberships Badges, and MORE!

media:group.media:title: Channel Insights Sharing Setting, Product Tags, 10-Year Channel Memberships Badges, and MORE!
media:group.media:description:
Hello Insiders! Today we're talking about a new channel insights sharing setting in Studio, a reminder for non-compliant tagged products, new Channel Memberships loyalty badges, and "pull to refresh" on the channel page.
Check it out and leave us your comments and questions below!

entry.title: Audience Segments, Leaderboard for Top Fans, "Most relevant" Comment Filter, and MORE!

media:group.media:title: Audience Segments, Leaderboard for Top Fans, "Most relevant" Comment Filter, and MORE!
media:group.media:description:
Hellooo Insiders! Today, we're talking about the launch of audience segments in YouTube analytics, to help you understand your audience on a more granular level, the expansion of the "most relevant" comment filter, as well as the leaderboard for top fans of classic and immersive livestreams to all creators, and more.
Check it out and leave us your comments and questions below!
Chapters: 0:00 Intro 0:12 [Launch] Audience Segments (ramping up today, over the next few weeks) 1:50 [Launch] "Most relevant" Comment Filter 2:06 [Launch] Leaderboard for Top Fans 2:42 [Launch] AI-Powered Search Carousel

entry.title: Auto-Dubbing Expansion, Inspiration Tab and Dream Screen to More Countries, Artist Channel Resources

media:group.media:title: Auto-Dubbing Expansion, Inspiration Tab and Dream Screen to More Countries, Artist Channel Resources
media:group.media:description:
Hello Insiders! Today, we're talking about the expansion of auto-dubbing to 80 million creators, as well as 11 new languages, Dream Screen and the Inspiration Tab in more markets, new resources for artist channels, and the launch of the ability to sync imported Shorts content to the beat.
Check it out and leave us your comments and questions below!
***Interested in helping improve the future of auto-dubbing?*** SIGN UP HERE: https://google.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_brctXw6jxNqaelU?referral_code=YTCR64

entry.title: Updates to Analytics Advanced mode in YouTube Studio!

media:group.media:title: Updates to Analytics Advanced mode in YouTube Studio!
media:group.media:description:
Hello Insiders! Today we're here with Jerome and Zhu, to tell us about improvements coming to Advanced Mode analytics in YouTube Studio, including the ability to save reports, and simplified ways to understand your data. If you have questions you'd like answered through data, we're here to help- leave them in below.
Check it out and leave us your comments and questions below!
